attributes.action: Make Kevin Ian Rangers Docherty Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kevin Is some what an unheard of person in certain areas of the world, yet the people who know him and that is many will certainly vote for this. Kevin is Without doubt the dark horse to become next prime minister. He will take the country by storm. He is not only Passionate about life he is Orange. Vote for King Kev ! Vote for The Rangers Revolution!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
